ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: It's too quiet for a bunch of musicians
ygData.msgSnippet: I did this in front of the Goblin mines in LOIO until lvl 30. Pull with lament and a lute Bellow a few times to soften them up pull to the far side of the area
ygData.messageBody:
I did this in front of the Goblin mines in LOIO until lvl 30.
Pull with lament and a lute
Bellow a few times to soften them up
pull to the far side of the area to minimize adds (goblins can stun so you may want to party alone with your newfound friend until you are accustomed to the technique)
rinse and repeat. great fun
Windleaf Mistsong <windleaf@...> wrote:
Gargoyles in OOT
I was able to use all instrument combo to bring it down pretty low (Chords
of Dissonance, Denon's Disruptive Discord, Hymn of Restoration - swap brass
and lute appropriately) and when it got me too low, I would bellow kite
using 2 bellows and accelerando. This was pretty hard, so I would only
recommend this for someone who is a great kiter.

Windleaf
